item.title: Tongue Tied [Shortfilm]
item.dc:creator: arno

item.description: [ Camera, Sound Postproduction ] || : Best Sound, Best Film, Cinemadamare Filmfestival. Filming, editing and post audio was done in under 1 week. Everything was done in Italy during the film festival.

: Best Sound, Best Film, Cinemadamare Filmfestival.                   Filming, editing and post audio was done in under 1 week. Everything was done in Italy during the film festival.

item.title: The August Project [Feature length documentary]
item.dc:creator: arno
item.description: [ Directing, Camera, Editing, Audio Postproduction ] || The August Project is a 50 minute documentary that follows 5 artists who meet for the very first time in Ghent. They sleep and work in the same room, learning how to live together and what live is actually about.
item.content:encoded:
[ Directing, Camera, Editing, Audio Postproduction ] ||

The August Project is a 50 minute documentary that follows 5 artists who meet for the very first time in Ghent. They sleep and work in the same room, learning how to live together and what live is actually about.

item.title: Poor [shortfilm] (password: wuk)
item.dc:creator: arno
item.description: password: wuk [ Chef Sound, Audio Postproduction, Music Production ] || Poor is a shortfilm about 2 farmers getting into trouble. It was a group project on the filmschool Narafi. I was responsible for everything to do with sound: audio recording, mixing, music production and all the foley recordings.
item.content:encoded:
password: wuk
[ Chef Sound, Audio Postproduction, Music Production ] ||
Poor is a shortfilm about 2 farmers getting into trouble. It was a group project on the filmschool Narafi. I was responsible for everything to do with sound: audio recording, mixing, music production and all the foley recordings.

item.title: Mohéli Laka Lodge
item.dc:creator: arno
item.description: [ Camera, Drone Pilot, Montage ] || One of the videos created for Laka Lodge, a hotel located in the Comoros. This project consists of one main video (seen here) and 5 smaller videos focused on specific themes. All videos were shot in the Comoros in 3 weeks and edited in Belgium. Shot in a […]
item.content:encoded:
[  Camera, Drone Pilot, Montage  ]  ||

One of the videos created for Laka Lodge, a hotel located in the Comoros. This project consists of one main video (seen here) and 5 smaller videos focused on specific themes. All videos were shot in the Comoros in 3 weeks and edited in Belgium. Shot in a Sony a6500, Ursa mini 4.6k and Mavic Pro.

item.title: Inclusive Education [Light For The World]
item.dc:creator: arno
item.description: [ Camera, Editing, Sound Postproduction ] || One of 10 videos created for the NGO Light For The World. All the videos were shot in Rwanda over 6 weeks and edited in both Belgium and Rwanda. Shot on FS7.
item.content:encoded:
[  Camera, Editing, Sound Postproduction  ]  ||

One of 10 videos created for the NGO Light For The World. All the videos were shot in Rwanda over 6 weeks and edited in both Belgium and Rwanda. Shot on FS7.

item.title: Intro Sequence Teleurdeugd
item.dc:creator: arno
item.description: Intro Sequence for the feature length film “Teleurdeugd”, which had theatrical releases.
item.content:encoded: Intro Sequence for the feature length film “Teleurdeugd”, which had theatrical releases.
